Great as always! Some clarification on fees:  the sat/byte is only applicable on-chain.
Lightning fees are related to the amount routed: https://api.lightning.community/#updatechannelpolicy …
There is a base fee (base_fee_msat). The default is 1000 millisat, which means 1 satoshi fee per every routed payment.

Bitcoin energy FUD is the easiest spin zone in the world.
